document_title: Early repolarization: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_content: In the past, premature repolarization was commonly observed in healthy young people and athletes. Therefore, it was once considered benign and not a medical condition. However, recent studies have shown that repolarization disease can progress to dangerous arrhythmias that are life-threatening.
subsection_title: tai cuc som.json. Early repolarization electrocardiogram
subsection_data:
tai cuc som.json. Early repolarization electrocardiogram
In the past, premature repolarization was commonly observed in healthy young people and athletes. Therefore, it was once considered benign and not a medical condition. However, recent studies have shown that repolarization disease can progress to dangerous arrhythmias that are life-threatening.
